item.description: Ladies, come join me for a different kind of workout! We'll begin with some fun cardio dance that includes belly dance, latin dance, and hip hop. Next, we'll use a chair, ball, and resistance bands to tone, tighten, and build lean muscle. We'll finish up really breaking a sweat learning and rehearsing a fun and flirty chair routine! You'll actually have some fun while getting in shape! *To attend you must register here at least 24 hours before the class: http://bridgetsdances... You don't have to pre-pay, just enter some basic info so the instructor knows you're coming. Classes are $7 each or $60 for a ten pack (can be combined with Bootcamp, Trim&Tone, Hip Hop, Pilates and Zumba) Wear comfortable clothes and sneakers, you will work up a sweat :)

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Strip Fit
